item.title: Observability 101
item.description: Observability is a measure of how well internal states of a system can be inferred from knowledge of its external outputs.

item.title: Design Patterns - Singleton
item.description: Singleton is a design pattern that limits the instantiation of a class to a single instance and provides global access to it.

item.title: Design Patterns - Builder
item.description: The builder pattern allows us to write readable and understandable code to build complex objects.
